title: Polynucleotide Skin Booster
tagline: Glass-Skin Glow Powered by DNA Repair
description: Injectable polynucleotides flood the skin with DNA fragments that repair, hydrate, and calm inflammation from the inside out.
longDescription: Polynucleotides (PN) are purified DNA fragments that act like a skin reboot button. Once injected, they attract water, awaken fibroblasts, and neutralise inflammation so texture smooths, pores tighten, and your complexion gains that ‘lit-from-within’ radiance. We customise PN protocols for face, neck, chest, and hands—perfect for anyone whose skin looks dull, stressed, or sensitive.

seo.metaTitle: Polynucleotide Skin Booster London | PN Injections | Dr. SNA Clinic
seo.metaDescription: Regain glass-skin radiance with polynucleotide injections at Dr. SNA Clinic London. Hydrate, repair, and calm stressed skin with minimal downtime.

hero.headline: Revive Skin with Polynucleotide Power
hero.subheadline: Targeted DNA fragments repair texture, boost glow, and calm stressed complexions.

overview.title: Why Polynucleotides?
overview.content: Stress, screens, and pollution exhaust your skin’s repair systems. Polynucleotides replenish them by delivering purified salmon DNA fragments that hydrate the extracellular matrix, calm inflammation, and jumpstart collagen. Expect softer lines, refined pores, and a bouncy glow—without volumising fillers.
highlights: Ideal for dull, sensitive, or dehydrated skin
Safe for all skin tones and seasons
Pairs seamlessly with PRP, microneedling, or lasers
Zero risk of overfilling—pure repair and hydration

howItWorks.title: The Science of PN Therapy
howItWorks.subtitle: DNA fragments revive every layer of your skin
howItWorks.content: Polynucleotides attract water, regulate inflammation pathways, and recruit fibroblasts to produce collagen and elastin. They also improve microcirculation, so skin looks brighter and healthier within days.

benefits.title: Deep hydration
benefits.description: PN molecules bind water for dewy, plump skin.

benefits.title: Inflammation control
benefits.description: Calms redness, rosacea, and post-acne irritation.

benefits.title: Collagen reboot
benefits.description: Signals fibroblasts to thicken and smooth the dermis.

steps.title: Skin Mapping
steps.description: We analyse hydration, tone, and sensitivity to customise your PN blend.

steps.title: Micro Injections
steps.description: Tiny droplets placed across face, neck, or chest using ultra-fine needles.

steps.title: Cooling & LED
steps.description: Optional LED therapy locks in calm, radiant skin.

steps.title: Glow Plan
steps.description: Leave with skincare, supplement, and schedule guidance.

items.title: Zero downtime glow

packages.name: Full Glow Protocol
packages.description: 3 PN sessions + PRP booster + homecare kit

candidacy.title: Is PN Right for You?
candidacy.note: We customise dose and technique for first-time injectables or combination plans.

faq.question: Will I see results after one session?
faq.answer: Most patients notice smoother texture within 10 days, with real glow after the second visit.

faq.question: Can it replace filler?
faq.answer: PN boosts hydration and collagen but doesn’t add volume. Pair with filler if contouring is also desired.
